data.eml:eml: Neomicrambe subgen. nov. of Micrambe Thomson, 1863 (Coleoptera: Cryptophagidae) from East Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Otero, José Carlos, Pereira, José Manuel (2019): Neomicrambe subgen. nov. of Micrambe Thomson, 1863 (Coleoptera: Cryptophagidae) from East Africa. Zootaxa 4674 (1): 47-67, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4674.1.2
